onKeydown(event)

Handle key down event. - CRTL-Z: undo - CRTL-Y: redo - CRTL-ARROW_LEFT: next frame - CRTL-ARROW_UP: next slice - CRTL-ARROW_RIGHT: previous frame - CRTL-ARROW_DOWN: previous slice Default behavior. Usually used in tools.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
event Object The key down event.
Source:
  • src/app/application.js, line 925
